issue.title: N4357 Introduce the [[noexit]] attribute for main as a hint to eliminate destructor calls for objects with static storage duration, N4226 Apply the [[noreturn]] attribute to main as a hint to eliminate global object destructor calls
issue.submitter: D. Diaz, E. Bringas, D. Gutson, J. Maurer

discussion.p: Discussed in Urbana. EWG was supportive of the idea, CWG pointed out various issues related to multiple translation units. Authors are encouraged to revise.
